page.title: 07RESIDENT'S VIEW S'PORT 1985
page.content: Southport now is a dormitory town and most people commute to larger towns such as Liverpool and Manchester. Although it is a seaside resort it has not yet decided which tourist market to settle with.The new rides at the fairground attract the younger tourist but the resident felt that more amenities were needed for the young people who live in Southport.Since Southport is so flat,it has always been popular as a resort for the elderly and many make it their home. More and more of the large Victorian houses are being converted to homes for the elderly,and retirement flats are being built all over the town.On reflection the resident felt that as public transport is excellent,all the shops are centrally situated and public services are good,Southport is an ideal residential area.
